{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[blow]]

#: {{zh-x|吹 口琴|to '''play''' the harmonica}}
# {{lb|zh|informal}} to [[drink]] [[alcoholic]] [[beverage]]s [[directly]] from a [[bottle]]
